activateForFund(address).details: Unimplemented by default, can be overridden by the policy

params._encodedSettings: Encoded settings to apply to a fund

params._asset: The asset for which to check if it is bypassable

returns.isBypassable_: True if the asset is bypassable

canDisable().details: False by default, can be overridden by the policy

returns.canDisable_: True if the policy can be disabled

startAssetBypassTimelock(address).details: This function must be called via ComptrollerProxy.vaultCallOnContract(). This allows the function to be gas relay-able. It also means that the originator must be the owner.

params._asset: The asset for which to start the timelock period

updateFundSettings(address,bytes).details: Disallowed by default, can be overridden by the policy

validateRule(address,uint8,bytes).details: Requires onlyPolicyManager as it updates state using passed data

params._encodedArgs: Encoded args with which to validate the rule

activateForFund(address).notice: Validates and initializes a policy as necessary prior to fund activation

addFundSettings(address,bytes).notice: Add the initial policy settings for a fund

assetIsBypassableForFund(address,address.notice: Checks whether an asset is bypassable (if still without a valid price) for a given fund

canDisable().notice: Whether or not the policy can be disabled

getAssetBypassWindowStartForFund(address.notice: Gets the timestamp from which an asset without a valid price can be considered to be valued at `0`

getPolicyInfoForFund(address).notice: Gets the PolicyInfo for a given fund

identifier().notice: Provides a constant string identifier for a policy

implementedHooks().notice: Gets the implemented PolicyHooks for a policy

startAssetBypassTimelock(address).notice: Starts the timelock period for an asset without a valid price

updateFundSettings(address,bytes).notice: Updates the policy settings for a fund

validateRule(address,uint8,bytes).notice: Apply the rule with the specified parameters of a PolicyHook

documentation.text:
@notice Provides a constant string identifier for a policy
 @return identifier_ The identifier string

@notice Gets the implemented PolicyHooks for a policy
 @return implementedHooks_ The implemented PolicyHooks

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (bytes memory) pure returns (address,address,bytes4,address[] memory,uint256[] memory,address[] memory,uint256[] memory)
function (address,address[] memory,uint256[] memory,address[] memory,uint256[] memory) returns (uint256)

documentation.text: @dev Helper to determine if an adapter is bypassable

@notice Gets the `ADDRESS_LIST_REGISTRY` variable
 @return addressListRegistry_ The `ADDRESS_LIST_REGISTRY` variable value

@notice Gets the `BYPASSABLE_ADAPTERS_LIST_ID` variable
 @return bypassableAdaptersListId_ The `BYPASSABLE_ADAPTERS_LIST_ID` variable value

@notice Gets the `TOLERANCE_PERIOD_DURATION` variable
 @return tolerancePeriodDuration_ The `TOLERANCE_PERIOD_DURATION` variable value
